title: Mockup
description: Professional mockup templates for stunning presentations. Create realistic device mockups, branding mockups, and product presentations. Use tools like Angle, Cleanmock, and Shotsnap to showcase your designs professionally.

resources.title: Angle
resources.description: Premium collection of 1900+ vector and 3D device mockups for Sketch, Figma, and Adobe XD. Realistic and customizable presentation templates.

resources.title: Apple
resources.description: Official marketing resources and product images from Apple. Download PSD templates for iPhone, iPad, Mac, and other Apple devices.

resources.title: Cleanmock
resources.description: Free browser-based mockup generator. Create professional device mockups and screenshots with customizable backgrounds and layouts.

resources.title: Haikei
resources.description: Generate unique SVG background patterns, shapes, and design assets. Customize colors, layers, and export for web and print.

resources.title: Shotsnap
resources.description: All you need to do is to choose what device to show it off on, and upload your image for it to be show on the device you chose.
